entry.title: Baby Boogie Butler Mini GREEN
entry.summary:
Vendor: Washdollywholesale
Type: cloth
Price: 66.00

6, 5 packs

~Unit price $11.00~

~RETAIL price $21.99~

The Baby Boogie Butler grips stubborn boggies a.k.a mucus and helps to prevent sore and dry skin resulting from continuous wiping.

  • reusable
  • great for travel
  • packaging for storageÂ 
  • excellent baby giftÂ 
  • practicalÂ 
Selling point: Â The cloth is small and extremely soft so when you wipe the baby's nose they don't feel overwhelmed especially if you approach them below their chin.

It is van derr Waal's force which helps to grip the boogies for easy removal.

FEED BACK: Our customers report the children wiping their own noses because they love the texture. Wiping diaper rash with a wet Boggie Butler has also been reported.

For best results wet the Boogie Butler.

It lasts about 1000 washes.

Care Instructions:

No fabric softener...because it may coverÂ magic grip.

No hot water... because they will wear out faster.

Â 

We care about the environment and encourage keepingÂ the packaging for various uses.

How to exfoliate: use cloth in its damp form.

Care Instructions:

After you remove makeup rinse with soap and water then hang to dry.Â 

Wash in washer and dryer but...

NO hot water...because it will wear out faster.

NO fabric softener...because it will coat the magic grip.

Promises a feel good moment with every use.
